title: Put a smile on your face! You've just found the right place!
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1186 - 1307 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1525', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', 'Welcome to East Perimeter Pointe, a residential community featuring 1 and 2 bedroom apartments in Decatur, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apt for rent in Decatur, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Community Amenities', '➢ 24 Hour Availability', '➢ BBQ Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Community Events', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Gated Access', '➢ Indoor Pool', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Onsite Management', '➢ Swimming Pool', '➢ Electronic Rent Payment', '➢ Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ On-site Maintenance Management', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Racquetball Court(s)', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Unit Features', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Cozy Fireplaces', '➢ Custom Paint Tone', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Garbage Disposal', '➢ Linen Closet', '➢ Sunrooms', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ Hardwood Flooring', '➢ Newly Renovated Apartments', '➢ Patio or Balcony Options', '➢ Roommate Floor Plans', '➢ Townhomes Available', '➢ Upgraded Lighting Package', '➢ Washer & Dryer Connections', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2DC5458DD3F2464D']
